spec_data.Name: adevs-devel
spec_data.Description:
Header files and development libraries for adevs package.
Adevs (A Discrete EVent System simulator) is a C++ library for constructing
discrete event simulations based on the Parallel DEVS and Dynamic DEVS
(dynDEVS) formalisms.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Mon 22 May 2017 10:26:48 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: C++ library for constructing discrete event simulations
